WHAT I'M READING

Things I’m reading this week:

Republicans Always Listen to the Pentagon—Except When It Says Climate Change Is Real - @ New Republic by Rebecca Leber 1

You Don’t Need Tor to Access the Darkest Corners of the Internet - @ Motherboard by Joseph Cox

C-Section Births Hit Record High; Most Common Surgery in U.S. Hospitals - @ ABC News by Michael Murray2

The Alliance: Managing Talent in the Networked Age - by Reid Hoffman, Ben Casnocha, and Chris Yeh

  1. Rebecca Leber is a Staff writer at the New Republic covering climate change and energy policy. ↩

  2. Michael Murray an Bureau Producer/Editor/Field Producer at Disney ABC Television Group/ABC News. ↩
